attributes.action: Provide clean and comfortable breastfeeding areas in suitable public establishments for example, shopping centres so that babies can get the best milk available without prejudice from passers by or other patrons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many mothers turn to formula milk due to the stigma that this country has around mothers feeding their babies in public. As we all know breast is best so the government should be providing adequate facilities for public feeding to ensure that babies get the best start in life.
